availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Newport, Kentucky, bank clerk. Kentucky native. Son of Joseph A. Piner and Elizabeth Piner. Bank clerk in the Banking House of Joseph A. Piner in Newport in 1860. Served in the 8th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U. S. A.) from August 16, 1862, to September 23, 1863.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, City of Newport, p. 135; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Newport, p. 249; Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 217.
